item.title: Setting Up a First Personal Website
item.description: Here I’ll describe how I went about making my personal website (this one) and how I deployed it on github pages. The whole process wasn’t as easy as I thought it would be so hopefully this will help someone else down the line. The assumptions I’ll make : You are reasonnably familiar with the command line ; You are reasonnably familiar with Git and GitHub ; You are reasonnably familiar with the web languages : HTML and CSS.

item.title: Roadmap to ML
item.description: This is my roadmap to go from an undergraduate CS and math background to a very good understanding of Machine Learning and Deep Learning concepts, and more importantly to successfully apply ML and DL. I will put here everything I’ve done, I’m doing, and I’m planning on doing in order to reach that goal. What I’ve already completed will be in italic, what I’m currently doing in bold and the rest is what I’m planning on doing next.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello there ! I’m a CS student who discovered Machine Learning in 2018. I’ve been working hard to learn it since then. I’m especially interested in Deep Learning. I’m also a strong believer in self-learning. So in addition to my French engineering school, I take MOOCs and build things to learn and practice. For example, I’ve attended version 3 of the fast.ai course live from October to December - a rather tough planning for me because the classes were beginning at 3 a.
